Name: KirairaRail
Notes: A sea mine that moves on a path. When the player approaches it, its eyes will open and it turn towards the player. Touching it will cause it to explode which hurts the player. If hit with a Koopa Shell, its explosion will also target other nearby objects.

Obj_arg0.Name: Movement Speed
Obj_arg0.Description: Sets the rate at which it moves on the path. Default is 5.

SW_B.Description: Gets activated after it explodes. Gets deactivated again when it recovers.

Rail.Description: The path that it moves on.

Group.Description: If one of the mines in this group explodes, all active mines will turn towards the exploded mine.

ClippingGroup.Description: Objects in this group are always clipped together.

SearchTurtle.Description: Red Koopa Shells and Gold Shells home in on this object.
